missing_capabilities.description: No vendor offers native support for managing domain interdependencies or dynamic cross-domain governance aligned with TMF cross-domain lifecycle concepts.

observations.observation: Comarch's OSS modules support modular integration across service layers but require custom integration logic for coordination.
Limited visualization of dependencies across domains in out-of-the-box dashboards.

comarch.score_decision: Scored 3 due to existing modularity and API support, but lacks native cross-domain orchestration models.

observations.observation: ServiceNow's CSDM provides a logical structure for domain mapping, but lacks native support for cross-domain impact visualization.
Workflows can be built manually to simulate coordination between ITOM and ITSM modules.

servicenow.score_decision: Scored 2 for limited native capability but flexible manual extension through workflow builder.

observations.observation: Salesforce does not support any cross-domain modeling; all service constructs are isolated within CRM and Service Cloud layers.
Any coordination requires custom development using Apex and managed packages.

salesforce.score_decision: Scored 1 as no domain governance or cross-service awareness exists in core offerings.
